entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to rain showers at times heavy in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
